title: 13: Logical Fallacies, Part 1
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The logical fallacies can be bunched into a few headings. There are quite a few of them, and this episode isn't exhaustive, but we hit the biggies. In this episode, we focus primarily on the fallacies of distraction.
itunes:author: Graeme, A.J., & Bees
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, we discuss the all the logical fallacies of distraction.
itunes:summary: The logical fallacies can be bunched into a few headings. There are quite a few of them, and this episode isn't exhaustive, but we hit the biggies. In this episode, we focus primarily on the fallacies of distraction.
